definition: stress/abbr. for 應激反應|应激反应[ying4 ji1 fan3 ying4]
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with

sentences.english: The death group has higher blood glucose level than the survival group.
sentences.chinese: 死亡组较存活组应激性血糖浓度高。

sentences.english: These indicated that the body was in the state of oxidative stress, especailly the mammary gland.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，患牛机体与乳腺组织处于氧化应激状态。

sentences.english: ConclusionGestational stress can impact the maternal care, and oxytocin can protect these behaviors.
sentences.chinese: 结论怀孕后期持续应激能够明显损伤母鼠的母爱行为。

sentences.english: In wrap restraint stress rats , both defecation and colon transit increased. Guanylin contents in plasma and colon increased too.
sentences.chinese: 束缚应激大鼠血浆及结肠组织中鸟苷素的含量增加。

sentences.english: These elevated levels of stress hormone signal the body to store fat.
sentences.chinese: 这些高浓度的应激激素会促使身体存储脂肪。

sentences.english: Objective To study the anti-stimulation action of Aleppo Avens.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究蓝布正的抗应激作用。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the relation between stress hyperglycemia and prognosis of imminent neonate.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨危重新生儿预后与应激性高血糖之间的关系。

sentences.english: Methods The liver injury model was established under restraint stress for 12h in mice.
sentences.chinese: 方法采用拘束负荷方法引起小鼠应激性肝损伤模型。

sentences.english: The pre-slaughter stress commonly existed in the meat practice of pigs.
sentences.chinese: 宰前应激在我国猪肉生产中普遍存在。

sentences.english: Relaxation training and foreknowledge could be all used as intervention on fighting against stress.
sentences.chinese: 放松训练和预知都可以用作对抗应激时的干预方式。

sentences.english: However, excessive or aberrant ER stress results in cell injury or death.
sentences.chinese: 过度的内质网应激将导致细胞损害和死亡。

sentences.english: Post-traumatic stress disorder is near the top of that worry list.
sentences.chinese: 创伤后应激障碍是最被担心的。

sentences.english: Objective To study on regulative action of scalp acupuncture on oxidative stress reaction at operation stage.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨头针对手术期氧化应激反应的调节作用。

sentences.english: Signal use of matrix cream can also reduce oxidative stress in skin tissue of rats with diabetes.
sentences.chinese: 单用霜剂基质也可适当降低皮肤组织氧化应激状态。

sentences.english: Post-traumatic stress symptom was negatively correlated with QOL.
sentences.chinese: 创伤后应激障碍症状与生活质量呈负相关。

sentences.english: XBP1 is endoplasmic reticulum stress signs.
sentences.chinese: XBP1是内质网应激的标志物。

definition: porcine reproductive and respiratory syndrome (PRRS)/blue-ear swine fever

pinyin: zi4 zhu3 shen2 jing1 xi4 tong3

definition: anabolism (biology)/constructive metabolism (using energy to make proteins etc)/assimilation
